--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> OOC: Sorry, I thought you said Redhot was a female.

    OOC: LOL..no problem. It made for a fun in-game explanation. 
*wink*



> 
> Cliffjumper curled his lip in disgust, both at the shape this
Seeker 
was
> in, and at the pathetic blubbering. "Yeah, well if you hold no
> alligience to Decepticons, I won't hold your form against you." He
> looked at Cliffjumper who nodded. "Do you wish to join us."
> 
> Firedrill looked up. "Well, he hasnt drawn any guns yet, that's good
> news, right?" he asked, unsure of Cliffjumper's hatred for 
Decepticons.


::REDHOT::

    If it wasn't for the different coloration, one could have sworn
it 
was Starscream who laughed.
    "Alligience... to the Decepticons?..Primus...NO!!" His laugh 
became harder. "I..once was...Gave..that up...loooong time ago."
He wheezed, closing his eyes tight. "As for becomming an..Autobot...I 
would like... to ally myself with... you 
yes....Be..one...no...not..yet. I would like to withhold... my 
decision on that. " He waved his hand in the air. "Anyway..I need to 
rest. My cockpit is..KILLING..me." He lowered himself to his knees to 
accent his point.
    After a momment, he whispered to Beachcomber so that Cliffjumper 
and Firedrill would not hear. He hoped. 
    "Is the small red..one always..so catty?" he asked. He appeared 
amused but irritated by Cliffjumper's attitude.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
